MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Penyffordd affecting properties in Abbotts Lane, Fairview, Rhos Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at  8:04am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:17am on 22nd December 2020
